description: This view contains audited referral changes not associated with a direct item change on the Referral File (RFL) record.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The ID for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HX_USER_ID
columns.description: The user tied to the audited action on the referral.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: ACTION_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Store the UTC instant when an action took place.

columns.name: NON_ITEM_CHANGE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The non-item change category ID associated with the audit action


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Create Referral


Authorize Referral


Reject Referral


Pend to Self


Pend to Director


Pend to Specified Pool


Pend to Employee


Add Procedure


Change Units Approved


Change Units Requested


Change Visit Info


Change Coverage


Assign Referral to Appointment


Unassign Referral from Appointment


ANSI 278 Message Sent


ANSI 278 Message Filing Prevented


Delete Note


In Basket Referral Message Sent


Add Revenue Code


Change Revenue Code


Questionnaire Changed


Create Note


UAE Prior Auth Request Message Sent


UAE Prior Auth Message Received


Service Level Authorization Created


Service level Authorization Edited


Service Level Authorization Deleted


Synchronize Group Data


Receive Group Data


Change Procedure Provider


Update Questionnaire Answers


Change Completed Visits


Change Scheduled Visits


Change AP Claims Count


ANSI 278 Inquiry Message Sent


Electronic Attachment Message Sent


Electronic Attachment Message Failed to Send


Electronic Attachment Received


Use Service-Level Authorization Count in Claim


Remove Service-Level Authorization Count from Claim


Procedure Grid Modified


Communication Added


Assign Auth/Cert to Hospital Account


Unassign Auth/Cert from Hospital Account


Assign Auth/Cert to Admission


Unassign Auth/Cert from Admission


Conversion or Utility


Change Pre-Cert Status


Attached Initiating Referral


Attached Subsequent Referral


Unattached Initiating Referral


Unattached Subsequent Referral


Linked Referral to Treatment Plan


Linked Referral to Waiting List


Removed Referral from Waiting List


In Basket Message Sent


Communication Removed


Unlinked Referral from Treatment Plan


Service Level Authorization Approved


ANSI 278 Message Failed to Send


ANSI 278 Inquiry Message Failed to Send


Trigger pikaXml KAS message


Link Service Decision


Unlink Service Decision


External Document Invalidated


External Document Added

columns.name: HX_TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The ID of the treatment plan record associated with the audit action

columns.name: HX_WAITING_LIST_ID
columns.description: The ID of the waiting list record associated with the audit action

columns.name: HX_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The ID of the pathway record linked to the audit action

columns.name: HX_HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the hospital account record linked to the audit action

columns.name: HX_APPT_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The Contact Serial Number (CSN) of the appointment linked to the audit action

columns.name: HX_COMM_ID
columns.description: The ID of the communication record linked to the audit action

columns.name: HX_AUTH_ID
columns.description: The ID of the service level authorization record linked to the audit action

columns.name: HX_MSG_ID
columns.description: The ID of the In Basket message record linked to the audit action

columns.name: HX_ORDER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the order record associated with the audit action

columns.name: HX_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The ID of the note record associated with the audit action

columns.name: HX_FIN_ASST_TRACKER_ID
columns.description: The FNT record that corresponds to the Service Decision-based non-item change in I RFL 16140.

columns.name: HX_CLAIM_TX_ID
columns.description: Stores the Accounts Receivable Transaction (ETR) associated with this audited change

columns.name: HX_RCV_DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The received document record that corresponds to the non-item change in referral audit history.
